bug.author: timshane
bug.description: Receive the following error when attempting to run ciphey on macOS Catalina: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ciphey/Decryptor/basicEncryption/basic_parent.py", line 11, in import Decryptor.basicEncryption.caesar as ca ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'Decryptor' During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/bin/ciphey", line 5, in from ciphey.main import main File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ciphey/main.py", line 47, in from ciphey.Decryptor.basicEncryption.basic_parent import BasicParent File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ciphey/Decryptor/basicEncryption/basic_parent.py", line 17, in import ciphey.Decryptor.basicEncryption.caesar as ca File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ciphey/Decryptor/basicEncryption/caesar.py", line 11, in import cipheycore File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/cipheycore/init.py", line 13, in from . import _ciphey_core_py ImportError: cannot import name '_ciphey_core_py' from partially initialized module 'cipheycore' (most likely due to a circular import) (/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/cipheycore/init.py)

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.82. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Hey! This is caused by the stable version of Ciphey. Please use the latest version <denchmark-code>pip3 install ciphey==5.0.0rc10 </denchmark-code>
Just an addendum: we are planning to properly release this version tomorrow, which should mean that this never happens again
